chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product is iPhone 13 mini with the above problem: 
I got a green one (the color doesn't look like Apple's original green) instead of the red one I ordered, along with an undesired case. I'd like to claim it and get the correct red iPhone. 
Thank you for your help,

Hello Louise, You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Just drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: Before you prepare your return: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item here 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product 3. Remove any protective wrapping or film 4. Wrap your product and its accessories according to the tips below. How to wrap your product: • The box should be strong and sturdy, and your product should be placed in a way that it won't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside to identify your package if the original label is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before you send it. This will protect you in case your product gets damaged during transit. Your return is now ready for drop-off! We'll let you know when it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hello ecomobile,

You sent the device in the wrong colour.

Please send the iPhone 13 in red.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We will check if there is sufficient stock for an exchange. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JH

Hello ecomobile,

We will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market
